SELECT emp.EMPL_NO , emp.PASSWORD , emp.ENABLED , emp.EMPL_NM , emp.BRTHDY , emp.TELNO , emp.ACNUTNO , emp.BANK_NM , emp.EMAIL , emp.POST_NO , emp.ADRES , emp.DETAIL_ADRES , emp.ECNY_DATE , emp.RETIRE_DATE , emp.ATCH_FILE_NO , emp.ELCTRN_SIGN_IMAGE_URL , emp.PROFL_PHOTO_URL , emp.DEPT_CODE , emp.CLSF_CODE , emp.GENDER_CODE , emp.EMPL_STTUS_CODE , emp.ANSLRY , emp.PARTCLR_MATTER , emp.CONTD_EMPNO , cc.cmmn_code_nm FROM EMPLOYEE emp LEFT JOIN common_code cc ON emp.clsf_code = cc.cmmn_code AND cc.cmmn_code_group='POSITION' WHERE ENABLED='1'

SELECT e.EMPL_NO, PASSWORD, ENABLED, EMPL_NM, BRTHDY, TELNO, ACNUTNO, BANK_NM, EMAIL, POST_NO, ADRES, DETAIL_ADRES, ECNY_DATE, RETIRE_DATE, ATCH_FILE_NO, ELCTRN_SIGN_IMAGE_URL, PROFL_PHOTO_URL, DEPT_CODE, CLSF_CODE, GENDER_CODE, EMPL_STTUS_CODE, ANSLRY, PARTCLR_MATTER, CONTD_EMPNO, AUTHORITY, cc.upper_cmmn_code FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN AUTH a on(e.empl_no = a.empl_no) LEFT JOIN common_code cc on(cc.cmmn_code = e.dept_code) WHERE e.EMPL_NO = #{emplNo} AND ENABLED = '1'
SELECT CC.CMMN_CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON CC.CMMN_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE WHERE CC.CMMN_CODE_GROUP='DEPARTMENT' AND E.EMPL_NO=#{emplNo}
SELECT CC.CMMN_CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON CC.CMMN_CODE = E.CLSF_CODE WHERE CC.CMMN_CODE_GROUP='POSITION' AND E.EMPL_NO= #{emplNo}
SELECT cc.cmmn_code_nm FROM common_code cc LEFT JOIN employee e ON cc.cmmn_code = e.gender_code WHERE cc.cmmn_code_group='GENDER' AND e.empl_no=#{emplNo}
